summary.span: 命名空间提供类，使您能够与系统进程、事件日志和性能计数器进行交互。

span.span: The namespace provides classes that allow you to interact with system processes, event logs, and performance counters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 组件提供了写入事件日志、读取事件日志项以及在网络上创建和删除事件日志和事件源的功能。The component provides functionality to write to event logs, read event log entries, and create and delete event logs and event sources on the network. 提供了一种异步交互事件日志的方法。The provides a way to interact with event logs asynchronously. 支持类提供对更详细的控制的访问权限，包括：权限限制、指定事件日志类型的能力（控制使用事件日志条目写入的默认数据的类型）以及循环访问事件日志的集合日志.Supporting classes provide access to more detailed control, including: permission restrictions, the ability to specify event log types (which controls the type of default data that is written with an event log entry), and iterate through collections of event log entries. 有关这些任务的详细信息，请参阅、 和类。For more information about these tasks, see the , , and classes. - 类提供通过网络监视系统进程以及启动和停止本地系统进程的功能。The class provides functionality to monitor system processes across the network, and to start and stop local system processes. 除了检索正在运行的进程的列表（通过指定计算机、进程名称或进程 id）或查看有关当前有权访问处理器的进程的信息之外，您还可以获取有关进程线程的详细信息，并通过类本身，以及与和类交互来模块。In addition to retrieving lists of running processes (by specifying either the computer, the process name, or the process id) or viewing information about the process that currently has access to the processor, you can get detailed knowledge of process threads and modules both through the class itself, and by interacting with the and classes. 利用类，您可以指定用于启动新进程的各种元素，例如输入、输出和错误流、工作目录和命令行谓词和参数。The class enables you to specify a variety of elements with which to start a new process, such as input, output, and error streams, working directories, and command line verbs and arguments. 这使您可以对进程的行为进行精细控制。These give you fine control over the behavior of your processes. 其他相关类使你可以指定窗口样式、进程和线程优先级，并与线程和模块的集合进行交互。Other related classes let you specify window styles, process and thread priorities, and interact with collections of threads and modules. - 类使你能够监视系统性能， 而类提供了一种方法来创建新的自定义计数器和类别。 The class enables you to monitor system performance, while the class provides a way to create new custom counters and categories. 可以写入本地自定义计数器，并从本地和远程计数器（系统和自定义）进行读取。You can write to local custom counters and read from both local and remote counters (system as well as custom). 您可以使用类来采样计数器，并使用类计算后续性能计数器样本的结果。You can sample counters using the class, and calculate results from successive performance counter samples using the class. 类使你能够在一个类别中创建多个计数器并指定其类型。The class enables you to create multiple counters in a category and specify their types. 与性能计数器组件关联的其他类提供对计数器、计数器权限和计数器类型的集合的访问权限。Other classes associated with the performance counter component provide access to collections of counters, counter permission, and counter types. 命名空间还提供了一些类，这些类可用于调试应用程序并跟踪代码的执行。The namespace also provides classes that allow you to debug your application and to trace the execution of your code. 有关更多信息，请参见 和 类。For more information, see the and classes.
